items.title: Cook to sue Trump over order to fire her from Federal Reserve
items.description: The central bank governor says the US president "has no authority to do so" in defiance of Trump's escalatory move against the Fed.

items.title: UN demands justice over Israeli double strike on Gaza hospital
items.description: An initial Israeli military report says the attack targeted a "Hamas camera" and identified "gaps" for further investigation.

items.title: Artwork looted by Nazis 80 years ago spotted in estate agent ad
items.description: Portrait of a Lady seen in house near Buenos Aires, more than 80 years after it was looted from a Jewish art dealer in Amsterdam.

items.title: Ukraine admits Russia has entered key region of Dnipropetrovsk
items.description: Military says Russian advance "is the first attack of such a large scale" in industrial province.

items.title: Teen avoids jail over plot to attack Taylor Swift Vienna concert
items.description: Mohamed A will serve an 18-month suspended sentence after sending bomb-making instructions.
